&reftitle.install;
LDAP support in PHP is not enabled by default. You will need to use the --with-ldap configuration option when compiling PHP to enable LDAP support.
Note to Win32 Users
In order to enable this module on a Windows environment, you must copy libsasl.dll from the DLL folder of the PHP/Win32 binary package to the SYSTEM32 folder of your windows machine. (Ex: C:\WINNT\SYSTEM32 or C:\WINDOWS\SYSTEM32)
